=====================
JEK family (ja/je/jo/ju)
=====================

mi ja do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (word)) (connective (ja)) (selbri (word))))

mi jo do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (word)) (connective (jo)) (selbri (word))))

mi ju do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (word)) (connective (ju)) (selbri (word))))

=====================
JEK + BO variants
=====================

mi ja bo do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (word)) (connective (ja_bo)) (selbri (word))))

mi jo bo do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (word)) (connective (jo_bo)) (selbri (word))))

mi ju bo do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (word)) (connective (ju_bo)) (selbri (word))))

=====================
JOI family (ce/ce'o/joi)
=====================

mi ce do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (word)) (connective (ce)) (selbri (word))))

mi ce'o do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (word)) (connective (ceo)) (selbri (word))))

=====================
JOI + BO variants
=====================

mi ce bo do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (word)) (connective (ce_bo)) (selbri (word))))

mi ce'o bo do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (word)) (connective (ceo_bo)) (selbri (word))))
